description: Craps is a dice game which you bet on the outcome of the roll of a pair of dice. A point set is first rolled and then after a series of rolls are done until the dice match the price set. If the user rolls a 7 while setting the point set, the user wins the bet. If during the roll series a 7 is rolled the player losses the bet. To see higher bets tap the 'bet' number, for a max of $500. Currently there is not saving, will be added in the future updates
